snippet.title: Restitched | Reveal Trailer (2022)
snippet.description:
A charming 2.5D puzzle-platformer featuring a robust level editor, extensive character customization, and engaging story mode. Follow the story of unlikely hero Stuffy as they travel the world and 'restitch' communities unraveled by greed and tyranny.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1361090/Restitched/

Learn more about Restitched: https://trixelcreative.com/restitched

**********************************

Join the Trixel Creative Discord Server: http://discord.gg/q8E2hr4

Trixel Creative on Twitter: https://twitter.com/TrixelCreative

Restitched on Twitter: https://twitter.com/RestitchedGame

Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/trixelcreative

**********************************

Music: Everyone Can Feel Alive - KidPenny
